attributes.action: Abolish income tax for those people who earn less than £300 per week
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People on lower wages face paying around a fifth of their income to the tax system. I propose that only those earning over £300 per week are subjected to income tax. The price of everything is rising,wages for those at the lower end of the pay scale are not.
